import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import labeldata from '../labeldata'; import '../css/detail.css'; import '../components/Compare'; function DetailProduct() { const [style, setStyle] = useState(false); const changeStyle = () => { setStyle(current => !current); }; const handleClick = (open, onClose) => { if(!open) { setStyle(current => false) ; } else { setStyle(current => true); } } const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const { id } = useParams(); var product = {}; if (id <= 5) product = labeldata.xiaomi[id-1] else if (id <= 11) product = labeldata.ecovacs[id-6] else product = labeldata.liectroux[id-12]; console.log(product); return (
